books.author: Karin Slaughter
books.description: The 12th book in the Will Trent series. Will and Sarah’s honeymoon is interrupted by the murder of the manager of the lodge where they are staying. Read by Kathleen Early. 18 hours, 6 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THIS IS WHY WE LIED

books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth. Read by Vanessa Johansson and Amy Landon. 8 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
books.title: VERITY

books.author: Rebecca Yarros
books.description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders. Read by Rebecca Soler and Teddy Hamilton. 20 hours, 47 minutes unabridged.
books.title: FOURTH WING

books.author: Sarah J. Maas
books.description: The fourth book in the Court of Thorns and Roses series. After alterations incurred by war, Winter Solstice approaches. Read by Amanda Leigh Cobb. 6 hours, 23 minutes unabridged.
books.title: A COURT OF FROST AND STARLIGHT

books.author: Brad Thor
books.description: The 23rd book in the Scot Harvath series. A mess of trouble involving double agents, international intrigue and a potential global firestorm forces Harvath to choose between his country and his conscience. Read by Armand Schultz. 11 hours, 39 minutes unabridged.
books.title: SHADOW OF DOUBT

books.author: Sarah J. Maas
books.description: The fifth book in A Court of Thorns and Roses series. Nesta Archeron is forced into close quarters with a warrior named Cassian. Read by Stina Nielsen. 26 hours, 5 minutes unabridged.
books.title: A COURT OF SILVER FLAMES

books.author: Jonathan Haidt
books.description: A look at the mental health impacts that a phone-based life has on children. Read by Sean Pratt and the author. 10 hours, 33 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE ANXIOUS GENERATION

books.author: JD Vance
books.description: The Yale Law School graduate and 2024 Republican vice presidential nominee looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood. Read by the author. 6 hours, 49 minutes unabridged.
books.title: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: Luis Elizondo
books.description: The former head of the Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program shares insights on unidentified anomalous phenomena. Read by Christopher Mellon and the author. 10 hours unabridged.
books.title: IMMINENT

books.author: Nancy Pelosi
books.description: The representative from California chronicles her journey in politics, including her time as the first woman to serve as speaker of the House. Read by the author. 10 hours, 45 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE ART OF POWER

books.author: Brian Tyler Cohen
books.description: The YouTube host and podcaster gives his take on the current state of the Republican Party. Read by the author. 4 hours, 38 minutes unabridged.
books.title: SHAMELESS

books.author: Steve Benen
books.description: A producer on “The Rachel Maddow Show” looks at how the Republican Party seeks to rewrite recent history. Read by Rachel Maddow. 5 hours, 38 minutes unabridged.
books.title: MINISTRY OF TRUTH

books.author: Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery. Read by Sean Pratt. 16 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.

books.author: Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over 35 years. Read by the author. 6 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.

books.description: The author of “Operation Paperclip” portrays possible outcomes in the minutes following a nuclear missile launch. Read by the author. 11 hours, 20 minutes unabridged.

books.description: The founder of FiveThirtyEight and author of “The Signal and the Noise” profiles professional risk-takers. Read by the author. 15 hours, 6 minutes unabridged.
